name: Oval Tray — KIFU PARIS
description: The KIFU PARIS Oval Tray is a classic piece perfect for every day usage. Handmade using Shagreen/Pen Shell/Pattern with a Bronze-Brass Patina Frame, it reflects a distinct identity with a mix of whimsical and luxurious elements. Suitable for wiping clean with a soft dry cloth, this tray is meticulously crafted in the Philippines and should be kept out of direct sunlight to maintain its authentic luxurious look.
